name: Introduction to Sociology - Sociological Inquiries
description: Using topics such as the mass media, crime and deviance, education, health, or others, this course continues to examine what is Sociology, its relationship with common sense and other disciplines, and the nature and goals of sociological research. Students will also have an opportunity to learn and develop important skills useful to prepare for second year courses and beyond.
exclusions: SOC101Y1, (SOC102H1 + SOC103H1), SOC200H1, SOC200Y1, SOCB05H3, SOC221H5, SOC200Y5
